input.value: data architect, data integration, SQL, ETL, MDM

div.div: data architect, data integration, SQL, ETL, MDM

div.span: Contract Corp-To-Corp, Contract Independent, Long Term

ul.li: Define and develop data standards, procedures, guidelines, policies, and lifecycles that meet strategic information requirements
Define solution architecture for data and analytics capabilities needed to enable clients’ business goals
Specify overall Data Architecture for all areas and domains of the enterprise, including Data Acquisition, Operational Data Stores, MDM, Data Warehouse, Data Provisioning, ETL and BI

Develop and maintain data flow diagrams, conceptual architecture, and solution details as needed to clarify data model meanings and usage effectively to a wide range of technical and non-technical consumers
Translate technical concepts into costs and risks to the business and adjust technology strategy and tactical efforts to meet corporate objectives
Perform data modeling activities – responsible for conceptual, logical, and physical schemas.
Work with Database Administrators and Data Integration (ETL) developers resulting in effective data driven solutions
Establish quality processes to deliver stable and reliable solutions
Perform data exploration using SQL tools
Identify and resolve performance and/or data related issues
Bachelor’s degree required in Computer Science or related fields
7+ years of hands on consulting work experience in healthcare payer space, with 3+ years of experience in strategy building assignments;
Minimum 2 years of experience in IT strategy or IT management role;
5+ years’ experience data modeling and solutions architecture
Thoroughly familiar with major RDBMS platforms (Oracle, Amazon, IBM, Microsoft, Teradata)
Thoroughly familiar with cloud data solution design and implementation
Experience with data integration techniques and proficient with major data integration tools (Informatica, DataStage, etc.)
Demonstrated experience in business process improvement, leveraging information and technology;
Strong verbal and written communication, with the ability to communicate clearly and effectively;
